website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight, solar lantern from LuminAID lasts 10 to 24 hours on a full 10 to 14 hour charge, depending on which of its many settings you select.
pros: Recharges in 10-14 hours in the sun and shines for 10 to 24 hours on a full charge
Easy to pack, good for emergencies, camping and children
cons: The manufacturer states that if it discharges to 1 or 2 bars, it will take a long time to recharge

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We purchased many of these solar lights to be used in the BVI post hurricane Irma and are very disappointed with many of the lights. Have been using for 6 weeks and out of 16 only 5 are still working. Several no longer stay inflated and all of the 11 which no longer work will no longer take a charge. We bought 55 of these lights to give to people in need and now would never recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: BERTHILIA PEETERS

customer_reviews.title: LOVED it when it worked for those 7 times
customer_reviews.text: I have had this lantern for exactly 35 days and have used it a total of 7 times and it is now suddenly not working. Extremely unhappy with this purchase, as it is just a few days out of return window. LOVED it when it worked for those 7 times... I'd definitely recommend buying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend who lives in farmland and has to take her dogs out at night or in the early morning before sunrise. She loves it!! And the fact that it’s water proof. She hasn’t had to charge it since the initial usb charge, we’ve used it at night and it’s brighter then we thought. May order another one for emergency and camping reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Don't think twice
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. This is my second light from Luminaid. I had to buy a new one after my daughter swiped my first! it charges quickly and provides hours of light. Bought another one for my friends who camp a lot and they love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for multiple family members in Puerto Rico after hurricane Maria destroyed the island. It has been so good for them. I am so grateful a product like this exists to help out my family while the power is restored. Thank you Luminaid.
customer_reviews.author: maidapr

customer_reviews.title: Great light and power resource.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought it for use during emergencies/power outages, but have been using it on the patio table to light up dinner. Very light weight and packable, if not a bit delicate for roughing it - feels similar to inflatable pool toys, but treat it with care in transit and it's a great resource - renewable light and power. I've been recommending it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Jim N

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how bright the light was, one thing to even read with it. Excellent product for emergencies!
customer_reviews.author: Sensible Decisions

customer_reviews.title: Has handle and charges easily
customer_reviews.text: This was exposed to very little light and already worked. Just like a calculator uses solar power, this used indoor light. It has a handle and collapses. I will use it by the pool but be careful... it can blow away so clip it onto something.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Super little light
customer_reviews.text: I really like this light. Time will tell on the battery life and how the plastic holds up in sunlight, etc. but so far the light is great. Easy to use and puts out a nice light. I bought for emergency use but using it every night outside for balcony dinners.
customer_reviews.author: Ebonyinkspot

customer_reviews.title: excellent for backpacking
customer_reviews.text: perfect use to hang in the tent. it also recharges in dim closed canopy. love the portable compact store away size. highly recommended for backpacking, camping, or emergency kit.
customer_reviews.author: LCruz

customer_reviews.title: I keep buying them because they work!
customer_reviews.text: I keep buying these because I keep giving mine away! The last went to a homeless bilateral leg amputee one dark night wheeling his wheelchair down my street (small town, no sidewalks) w/o any reflective gear. Pulled together some food, warm clothing and strapped one of these lanterns to his backpack and he wheeled off in the direction of the shelter. From behind he looked like a warm beacon of light in the wilderness. Saw him one evening a couple weeks later outside of some low- income apartments, the lantern attached to his wheelchair with 3 other guys playing checkers by lantern light. Yup, need me some more of these lanterns - got to keep my personal emergency stash filled!
customer_reviews.author: AmBarbazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After 2 Uses!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2nd use. Waste of money - do NOT buy this brand. We bought a different brand last year and it worked for several months. These types of lights are fun, but be aware they are very unreliable and likely not to work for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Barely lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: It was a decent product when it worked. But it's barely been a year, with minimal usage, and the lantern won't charge or turn on anymore. That's pretty bad quality given the price you're paying.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamp, that works well in emergencies and just kids generally playing around with it.
customer_reviews.text: This is lantern is great. My kids take it in the shower, into forts they make, in the car, everywhere. The only complaint I have is I wish you didn't have to charge it everyday, or that there was an auto shutoff feature. One cool thing to note is the second time you see it turn red, it isn't red it is a color shifting mode where it will then change through all the different colors in the cube.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Perfect for smaller areas
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. It does exactly what it should. It is an area lamp so it is not very harsh but great to illuminate a small area. I see no drawbacks relative to what it claims to be. The instructions gives you all the information needed in a concise and understandable format. This is great for small spaces, likes closets or inside of a car or inside of a tent. And outside to see your immediate radius. I will say that the model above this one, 150 lumens might be the best combination of size, brightness, and cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jared A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Trick or treaters dream!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of the usb charging versions (plain white) for halloween. One hung down from the stroller and the other in my little ones hand. She would not let go of it and was easily able to hold both this handle and her pumpkin handle in one hand to carry candy. We usually take strong flashlights so you can see up and down driveways/steps etc and we still took them as back ups this time just incase. We never had a need to use them. Our party of 8 and a stroller had enough light from these two lights to make it a safe and happy halloween. I would never go trick or treating without them again.
customer_reviews.author: QueenB

customer_reviews.title: I returned my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed when the lamp arrived to find out it was only the 4.7 in. luminaid....and not the 6 in. product. I went back to the listing on line and there was nothing there that said the Nova luminade was smaller....and nothing that said it only had 75 lumins....not the 150 lumins like the Pack lite Hero luminade or the Max luminade (but simply without the outlet for re-charging a cell phone)....I felt it was false adventising....no size, now power listing....poor practice on their part.
customer_reviews.author: ABCD

customer_reviews.title: fast charging, but blinding light for reading, having tea
customer_reviews.text: We're keeping this LuminAID light because we can fast charge it (yet charge last only 20 hours on 'low', compared to the other one we have: charge lasts 50 hours, but then it takes a long time to charge up). One thing that is annoying about this light is its BRIGHT, blue LED glare. It's too uncomfortable to read by. YET it sure throws out a good light for everything else. If I could I would've given it 3.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: An ordinary being

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. The light is bright. The only problem is that it was delivered on January 12th and stopped working on February 22nd. I believe that I left the light on the last night that it stopped working, the only time that I'd forgotten to turn it off. Shouldn't it only have needed a recharge? Still, I gave it 4 stars. Again, nice product. It needs work to make it last. If it had only cost $5, then it would be worth the cost to time ratio. But that's also wasteful. Maybe I can take it apart to use the parts for something else. I support the cause behind this lamp wholeheartedly though.
customer_reviews.author: AlVan

customer_reviews.title: It glows!
customer_reviews.text: I kind of thought this light would have been a little brighter, but that’s probably impossible due to the plastic shell. The shell diffuses the light a lot. It seemed more like a “fun” ambient light rather than a useful tool. It’s great for identifying your campsite or a specific area of your campsite in the dark. I do like the solar aspect, but only time will tell how functional that will be in the future.
customer_reviews.author: S C

customer_reviews.title: Genius!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in preparation of Hurricane season. They are multipurpose and I loved the design. As soon as I got it, I charged it up and tested it out. It was bright and easy to use. I went ahead and bought more and now I have 3 of them. They would also make beautiful outdoor lanterns to hang for entertaining on the deck or late night bbqing. I love that you can also use them to charge your phone or other electronics. You can’t go wrong with a product that is water proof and solar powered. After Hurricane season I will be using them for my late night walks on the beach. I am so pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Quin

customer_reviews.title: It is as efficient as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: We are more than satisfied, very happy for the great investment we made in these emergency solar lamps. There is no doubt about its quality and effectiveness. 2 years ago when it happened in Puerto Rico 🇵🇷 Hurricane Maria the island was devastated and the electricity service took months to recover. We sent this lamp to a friend and it really made a big difference in her home. You don't have to worry about batteries or cables. When it is an emergency this is what we need. It is light, the battery lasts a long time. I call this real quality. I recommend it without reservation is a total success
customer_reviews.author: Ana Figueroa Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Comes compete, ready to go with charge cable, small compact, bright light with 4 settings.
customer_reviews.text: I saw a news article on TV about the designers and decided to buy the Solar/USB version. Very good product, works as advertised. Comes compete, ready to go with charge cable - carry strap is built in and you can inflate or deflate by hand since they designed the air valve to allow some air to pass when spout is open! Charges in an hour or two by USB and Solar panel appears to charge in most light even though you must have direct sunlight (according to the instructions) to get a full charge in a day.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: The best travel light
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old is afraid of the dark. We bring this light with us when traveling and she always has a beautiful glowing night light. It is solar and USB rechargeable so if I forget to put it outside it's no panic. It deflates easily and packs small. It has a great velcro strap on the top for hanging. There are lots of colors to chose from but we usually stick with the blue for a night light. They are great for camping, hotels, and any place you need a travel night light. When using the white light, it's definitely enough to read by as long as it's close.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Spence

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered after seeing them on Shark Tank and I love them! Work great and are so convenient
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Michler

customer_reviews.title: LuminAID solar inflatable lantern and phone charger
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my son’s hiking through the Appalachian Trail. Lightweight enough to add to his limited weight for carrying supplies in his backpack. It provides a bright light and charges phones and it was the only light he needed. I bought several more for future camping trips. It is waterproof and floats.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Living through 2020 Apocalypse aka COVID Pandemic?
customer_reviews.text: You. NEED. THIS!!! This pandemic is reawakening the self sufficient practices I learned in the military. Self sufficient go bags are a must. Light is essential in any emergency. These are flexible, durable af and only need the sun to charge. This is a must have. I bought every version they have
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these lights several months ago for summer camping, which they proved to work very well. However, recently, during a Storm, power to our house was cut off for several hours (evening). I retrieved my LuminAID Solar Inflatable Lanterns and they were still fully charged from my last use and they were able to provide light inside our home unless the power was restored. Great Product! Useful in and out of the home! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use! Works fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light because I never seem to have a flashlight or candle when the lights go out! I hooked it up to my computer and very quickly it was at full power! With it being small and lightweight, so easy to store! I wouldn't necessarily use it for lighting my way outside but for inside, it's great! I feel safe and secure now that I have it....prepared for any emergency! Love the fact that it's so easy to recharge in the sun, too! Very, very happy with this light! Am planning on getting them for my family for holiday gifts this year!
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight, lasts a long time, great for a tent
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this light! It's great to take hiking or camping. I just got it so haven't tried it in the woods or campgrounds yet (closed due to COVID-19) BUT we've done some yard and basement camping for about a week and a half total. The light is great. I took it out and solar charged it one time and was surprised at how long it lasted. Very lightweight. You can easily strap it on a backpack and won't even know it's there. Great product, very glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Lady King

customer_reviews.title: Just heard yesterday that they love this solar lantern and it is working out well ...
customer_reviews.text: We (my church) collected funds to send this item to Puerto Rico which was devastated last fall by Hurricane Maria, leaving most of the island without electricity. Just heard yesterday that they love this solar lantern and it is working out well for them. So glad we chose your product!
customer_reviews.author: susan k hart

customer_reviews.title: great solar lamp saved me after hurricane maria
customer_reviews.text: i went through hurricane maria and spent months with out electricity these really saved me they run for hours on the highest setting with a full day charging out in sun. they really fill any room with light and havent given me any issues
customer_reviews.author: Javid

customer_reviews.title: Great for power outages and camping
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Own 2 of them, and will probably buy a few more. Used them during a recent power outage. Family didnt know I had them, since they were in my B.O.B.. They thought they were the coolest. Great illumination, compact storage, and hold their charge for a long time while being stored. Definitely recommend the USB charge capability. I dont plan on using it to charge a phone, but nice option if needed.
customer_reviews.author: sb337

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing lamp! After one full charge the lamp gave 9.5 hours of light. I live in the South Bay Area of California and we are currently under threat of power outages due to possible fires from electric wiring sparking. So, it is nice to have a lamp like this in addition to flashlights to carry me through this time. I plan to buy more of these for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: critik

customer_reviews.title: Two ways to charge the light
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Charges quickly via a cable. After that, I use the sun to top it off every few weeks. Really pleased with this light. It’s very bright, lightweight, and seems well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Like that is came with usb charger in case it's not sunny out. Very bright light. Love this company too as the inventors are women and they created it for people that survived post-earthquake in Haiti.
customer_reviews.author: Maven in Mpls MN

customer_reviews.title: Bright lantern
customer_reviews.text: Lantern is perfect. It’s very compact and blows up like an inflatable plastic beach ball. Has a cable to charge it up if there’s no sun (you need to provide the adapter) and has several different levels of brightness. Did not rate the battery life because I just received it but will review later. Great product and will purchase a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Keleka

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE. We always use our Coleman lantern, but it’s heavy and more work to light and use. Upon buying a 4wheel pop camper, we wanted something that could be lightweight, easy to move around (in and out of the camper) and something that wouldn’t wake the other up if one of us needed to get up in the middle of the night. These are exactly that. They have several different brightness settings and are so easy to use and recharge. We’ll definitely be buying more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Cierra E.

customer_reviews.title: Not the brightest spark...
customer_reviews.text: Well, that sums up my feelings for this light. At first, it was bright and full of charge between the outlet and the sun. However, as time went on the light grew dimmer and held absolutely no charge once in sunlight. I don't even use it everyday and it's not lasting long. Now, I plug it into the wall and turn it own. There's no rustic charm of camping and what not. I guess I should have bought a plug in lamp? Don't make these choices lightly, my fellows. Choose your light wisely.
customer_reviews.author: VivienneScarlett

customer_reviews.title: but I love this little lamp
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect, but I love this little lamp. It's very bright, and while I've bought it for emergencies, I use it almost every night to read in bed. It seems to keep a charge for a long time, but I haven't tested it to see exactly how long it will last. A must for anyone who lives in a hurricane-prone area, or goes camping.
customer_reviews.author: Newman

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to use for my camper that didn't add much weight. This is perfect for that. The light it gives off is pretty good, it folds down flat, and is very light weight! I'm thinking of purchasing another one! Can't really tell yet how long it lasts on a solar charge, but it was sufficient for an evening.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased two of these as Christmas gifts for friends who admired mine on a recent trip we all took to Africa. This light easily tucks away into the smallest suitcase or in your backpack. Batter life is amazingly long, light is bright without being obnoxious and the ability to solar charge and use the USB makes it versatile. Cannot say enough good things about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use.
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and it broke. Wish it lasted longer because when it worked it was awesome! Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Shut up and take my money! Lol
customer_reviews.text: This light is awesome! Solar charges great, USB charges great!. I love the ability to have it as just about any type of light you need. It's compact, about as thick as half a deck of cards when fully compressed. It's got an emergency flash setting, it dims several times af you want to. Definitely something im recommending.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Joy

customer_reviews.title: Best light for camping
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our LuminAID Solar Latern. It was so easy to use and charged easily in the sun - which is a huge bonus to not have batteries or use electricity. The second bonus though if you do need to - it has a USB port to charge as well, but we have not had to use that yet. We were on a quick overnight camping trip and the light was the best. It wasn't so bright that it felt blinding in the pitch black of the evening and early am, yet it was more than enough light to find things in the tent. It didn't feel like anything extra to carry so would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FeistyOptimist

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for what I got it for
customer_reviews.text: First one wouldn't hold air. The blow up valve didn't do its function. Replacement sent and diheld air much better. It puts out a fair amount of light on full power. I question how durable this will be. It is like a blow up pool float made out of soft vinyl which doesn't last but a season or 2. For the little bit pricey $25 bucks I hope it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic easy solar light must have for van life and RV life
customer_reviews.text: This is solar and easy to put on dashboard to charge up SUN or plug in usb. Easy to use with handy strap that is Very lightweight and portable. Great for van life and RV life and camping. Great for walking around at night inside or outside. LOVE THIS little portable luminous light!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Hyland

customer_reviews.title: Best solar light ever !!
customer_reviews.text: We bought several types of these solar, light weight "blow up" lanterns for camping and rafting trips. The LuminAID is the best one we have tried. Battery lasts up to 2 nights - even if we are in a forested shady area with little light to charge the battery. Love the handle too - makes it easy to hook on a back pack to charge while hiking or to hang the lantern up around camp.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great little lantern
customer_reviews.text: I use this lantern all the time. I keep it in the back of my truck to make finding things easier at night and take it camping and backpacking as well. It is great for backpacking as it compresses to a very small size and can be clipped to the outside of my backpack so it can charge while I'm hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping our power outages.
customer_reviews.text: This was the 2nd light we bought after using one in our house during a multi-day power outage. The light is pretty darn bright but it was great for lighting up an entire room. We then got a 2nd one so we could use it while camping and it was fantastic! Highly recommend this since it's solar or USB rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cook (Consignment)

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is no good
customer_reviews.text: I have other solar lights brands and I wanted to try this one. The design is good and i was thinking the lights were bright enough to create a nice environment inside our boat. Unfortunately the battery runs no more than one hour (doesn’t matter what kind of light color you pick) . I was trying to charge it all day with a direct solar exposure and the result is always the same. When I Charge using the AC adaptor chord, The battery seems to last a little longer, Maybe only 15 o 20 min more, that’s it. I am very disappointed with this product, fortunately I didn’t buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Really impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I had not heard about this on Shark Tank or whatever. Just happened to come across it on a camping website. It really works exactly as expected. It’s makes a really nice atmosphere when you hang a few around, especially with the color-rotation option. It’s pretty bright when you put it on white though. I’d recommend getting a few though.
customer_reviews.author: John Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great light that has many uses. A fire restriction must
customer_reviews.text: I used this as recommended by reviews, I initially picked up for fire restrictions in AZ, this to and some light on a group setting. It’s great for that and more, so much Bert than the led pull up lanterns. I wish I hadn’t purchased those especially after this. It really is nifty.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Storable
customer_reviews.text: This is one product that doesn’t make me feel like I’m adding to the clutter. It’s light and easy to make compact. Pay close attention to the KIND of light (color) you want. I bought white, and it gives a very bright pale glow to the area. I should have bought yellow to produce a warmer light.
customer_reviews.author: Strings10

customer_reviews.title: Great Lights and Fun
customer_reviews.text: These are great little lights! The illumination is more diffuse, not direct or pointed like a flashlight or torch. Various color options are fun. Easy to set up and use. The only downside would be you have to turn it off and on, it will not automatically turn on in the dark or at dusk. Small price to pay, though for such a great little light! Lasts months on a full charge!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Walker

customer_reviews.title: Can't blow it up fully
customer_reviews.text: Bad design of the blow tube, there's no pinch valve. Too stiff to pinch off. Maybe if I could use my tongue to close off the stopper it wouldn't half-deflate in my face before I seal it off. Too bad I bought 2 and then waited too long to return the one I hadn't opened. Yet another Kool Tool bum steer. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Conover

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but quickly broken.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this lamp, for one month. Then I put it in the sun to charge (in the desert in Nevada) for one day, and it died. Not accepting a charge from sun or USB anymore. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I love how compact it is and then the set up if you need to use it. It pops up in matter of seconds, and all you need to do is blow it up like a balloon and just sits there. A lot smaller then I thought it was. Cute little cube of colors :) A nice gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Solar Paneled Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I took this to my humanitarian trip to Puerto Rico and it helped out so many people. I bought many of these for families and for myself. By far the best solar paneled lamp I have ever used! Thank you LUMINAID!
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Luminaid is very useful for in home use
customer_reviews.text: Luminaid is very useful for in home use, so instead of using a night light I use this. If there is no strong sunlight I Charge it as per manufacturer's recommendation, for 2 hours. I use the lowest setting for the brightness and it lasts for more than 8 hours. One way of saving on electric bill
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping!
customer_reviews.text: I was favorably impressed by this light. Very bright, easily re-charged via solar (usb recharge also worked fine). The different light intensity levels were distinct and efficient. Folds flat, simply pull to "inflate" the accordion body for more light dispersal. Definitely going to purchase a couple more of these!
customer_reviews.author: M Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 6 weeks and died
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for the first couple weeks and then despite charging it all day everyday it just won' like anymore it just discharges and turns off. I bought the other one that has five different levels of white light and that one seems to be doing fine
customer_reviews.author: Jaden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love my luminaid! I use it for when I have to feed my horses at night and I don’t have any lights. Much better than a heavy flash light because I can hook it to my wrist and then the fence. I’ll definitely buy more to keep around the house for power outages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping.
customer_reviews.text: This lantern charges quickly and stays lit for hours. We just used it camping and it actually put out more light that my battery powered lantern. It deflates nice and flat so it's easy to store. I'm going to purchase another one to keep for camping and power outages.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Flat power button
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these (first was from different seller). This one that I received is very hard to turn on/off and change colors. The power button is completely flat and gives no "click" when pushed. Several attempts and lots of pressure is required to activate the switch. I'm sure it's just a matter of time before it completely fails.
customer_reviews.author: joebrady

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to use and compact for packing
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool lamp. We got it because we do a lot of driving and thought it would be a good backup in case of emergency. Plus, we don't have a lot of light around our hot tub so this adds some fun color and light. It also helps us find things that fall on the ground around the hot tub without having to use the light from our cell phones.
customer_reviews.author: Curt in Austin

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for backpacking trips, and it’s ideal! The sun charges it so you never have to worry about being left in the dark! It gives off a surprising amount of light. It is also great that I can charge it using the USB cord prior to leaving to go backpacking. It collapses down into a very light and compact item that takes up little room in my backpack. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M.

customer_reviews.title: Big light for a little lamp
customer_reviews.text: Several levels of brightness, suitable for any activities in tent or out. Just a great little lamp, light, can pack anywhere. I charged it on my dashboard, and then used it for entire camping trip. I didn’t keep it on for hours, so I can’t comment on battery life. I would recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.author: cristina negrea

customer_reviews.title: Best lantern for anything
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for camping or backpacking. We love that it charges in the sun. It’s a great all around survival tool. We bought for our 10 year old for his birthday and the multicolor lights are fun at the pool or lake. The brightness is extremely impressive compared to other camping light lanterns.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Battery longevity is accurate. Looks like it may last for 24 hours as a state. Definitely at 18 hours so far during my test right now. Very happy with this. Update, on the lowest setting, it’s currently at 26 hours straight.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: The small one is just about the right amount of light for a tent. My wife rolled her eyes when I bought it and took it camping for four days. She later told me to order two more. It weighs nothing ,takes hardly any space in trunk or backpack, Its solar panel won't fully charge it in a day but unless you're staying up real late it's enough.
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this light! You can charge it using solar power or the little usb cord. I have used this in the car, camping, and in a hotel as a night light. It has several settings so you can have it as bright or dim as you want.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsty

customer_reviews.title: Clever and awesome 👌
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. They make me appreciate the human ability of creative problem solving. I blew it up and had it charging in direct sunlight in minutes. After over approximately 4 hours, I tested it and I'm convinced it will be a staple in my teardrop trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Snow

customer_reviews.title: Bright lights
customer_reviews.text: As an optional lighting source for in case your lights go out, you go camping or have zero access to power, this is a nice option. They are chargeable by solar and by USB. They collapse and fold. Five settings with one flashing light option to signal for help. These came fully charged and when I tested them they were really nice for lighting up a space. I got 3 of them and I feel that is sufficient. I love not needing the power source if you can charge via sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: allen

customer_reviews.title: THERE IS LIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my friend that lives in Florida, that was without power. This particular model doesn't charge your devices. My friend really loves it! He is going to order the one that charges devices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fantastic for hurricanes or tornado sheltering
customer_reviews.text: so pleased. easy to use. varying light levels a plus. Took me thru Hurricane Delta. since my extended family lives in locations in the south (hurricane prone), I'll probably send these for Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.author: wcsdancer123

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold a charge after the second time using it
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these in July and when we first opened them up they both worked great. On our second camping trip we used these lights again and one of them worked great but the other will not charge. We drained the battery completely and then left it in the sun for 24 hours and even though the charging light was on we only were able to get one bar of charge and it’s never charged again. And of course now we’re pass the return window so we’re stuck with one that works and one that doesn’t. Kind of bummed cause these were great lights for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great lantern
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter recommended this; she keeps it by their back door when going outside at night with their dog. It is lightweight, bright, and easy to charge. Would be indispensable when camping, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Freckles

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money, my favorite lantern
customer_reviews.text: exceptional lantern!!! the usb charging option is a must; cloudy day no worries! pack light, inflates simply, works in the winter in the rain! i could not be happier or recommend this light more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Savage

customer_reviews.title: It works and can be powered by solar power or usb.
customer_reviews.text: This little solar lantern is amazing. It has 3 steady light settings and the 4th is a flashing light! It can be folded flat enought to fit in my purse or glove box. Everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Shaw

customer_reviews.title: So far So good
customer_reviews.text: We got this for emergency use and so far haven't had to use it. It does seem fairly expensive for what it is. Light is bright. Wish the blow valve wasn't located on the bottom of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic light for ambiance or lighting what you need to see
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this light for camping, due to its long battery life and durability of USB or solar charging. We were not expecting to be so impressed with its design and versatility. It lights a small area very well, and hangs easily on a branch or anything else with the quick clip handle. It looks great, and adds a nice ambiance to any area. We'll be purchasing another very soon!
customer_reviews.author: D. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Fun! But not utility light.
customer_reviews.text: The lantern doesn’t do much for lighting up a camping area but I love to use it at home. I love the changing colors and use it to relax. It’s my favorite bathroom item. I have it hanging outside of my shower so I can pick a color to help me unwind before bed in a low light environment.
customer_reviews.author: slimas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this specifically for backpacking and it was a big hit. Great design, quality product. Light weight. And super cool too! I love the multi-color feature--- It's fun to pick a color to suite the mood!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Glass

customer_reviews.title: The solar panel stays charged forever.... great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. We use it getting in & out of the hot tub on dark nights as well as when the electricity goes out. It stays charged forever as long as the solar panel sees daylight. I leave mine on the bedside table & I’ve never had to use the charge cord yet. We’ve had it for 3 yrs now
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Great Light and Fun Colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother for his birthday. We used it for a hiking trip this past week and it worked great! It lit up our cabin great and was very lightweight. We mostly used the white but the colors were fun.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these lights. I've bought over 20 of them. I have 2 that I've kept and given the rest as gifts. They have really good illumination, especially if you hang them in a tent. The first one that I bought, over three years ago, still works great. I am truly satisfied and definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Main

customer_reviews.title: A great lighting idea that works so well for recreational or when power not available.
customer_reviews.text: Not just a great idea but also flawless final product. Compact for shipping and storage, excellent workmanship, quick and easy to use when it gets dark or the power goes out. Solar charging or USB charging (model I got) provides quick way to be ready when storm warnings are issued. Holds charge between uses. Rarely a great idea implemented so well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mellon Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Really like this light
customer_reviews.text: Really like this light, but the USB port broke with the first charge. The company is sending out a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright light!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas, and he loves it. He likes to go camping, so it is convenient for him, but he uses it in the backyard as well, for lighting at night. It is simple to use, and the light lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Debra R.

customer_reviews.title: this is the portable light you need
customer_reviews.text: i bought some for parents for power outages and for friends for overseas trips where they were roughing it. both were fantastic uses for this light and much more efficient and portable than flashlights!
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the Camping Enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a White Elephant gift exchange with friends. All of my friends loved this so much that it got stolen twice! The person who ended up with it is an avid RV camper. She loved the different colors and now plans on buying herself more to hang as decorations from the RV when they are relaxing at their campsites this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Cloos

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these lights for my grandkids to play outside in the evening and take camping. They loved them. The lights are bright and very easy to carry around or flatten to store.
customer_reviews.author: Jody A Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Took this light camping. Great for in the tent. The adjustable brightness was nice for leaving it as a nightlight for my son. The benefit of recharging it the next day versus worrying about having sufficient batteries was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: won't stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: the overall colors and brightness work well. that combined with its compactness and solar charge capability would make it a great item. however, the piece where you fill it with air tore after just a few uses which makes it useless if it doesn't stay inflated
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Cool lights when house lights go out
customer_reviews.text: Lights the WAY to bathroom ..kinda cool..last night power outage lasted 6hrs..I activated 4 luminAid lights..had green lights (4) on all after 6th hour. Didn't need to recharge....cool again..
customer_reviews.author: cymbalsticks

customer_reviews.title: It convenient, lightweight and bright if need or turn on soft color for ambiance.
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. I use it while I’m reading and need more light or outside when it’s starting to get dark. It’s a great light to walk back to the house at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great Innovation!
customer_reviews.text: Great innovation! Ordered a few of these. Put a couple in our camping gear and a couple in our emergency go bags. And a couple on the boat. They work great and couldn’t be easier to use. I love innovative products that fill multiple needs. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Martin

customer_reviews.title: Most compact portable solar lantern ever!
customer_reviews.text: Great solar lantern. I love how it is also waterproof. It's the most compact portable solar lantern ever and great for camping/hiking!
customer_reviews.author: Christina R. Darlington

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: This is a winner. Lightweight, inflatable (& deflatable!), puts out nice light, can charge via sun or USB which is a real bonus.I may be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: NSD

product_meta.title: LuminAID Solar Inflatable Lanterns | Great for Camping, Hurricane Emergency Kits and Travel | As Seen on Shark Tank
product_meta.description:

feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Extra bright solar powered LED lantern. Multiple brightness settings make it a perfect indoor or outdoor light.
Lightweight, inflatable, collapsible, waterproof (IP67), shatterproof, and dustproof. Completely safe for children.
Great for camping, hiking, fishing, emergency preparedness, patio parties/picnics, fun in the pool, and more. Makes a perfect gift.
Long Battery Life - Up to 24 hours of light when battery is fully charged. No additional batteries needed!
Two Ways To Recharge (Solar & USB) - Recharges in approximately 10 hours of direct outdoor sunlight or by micro USB input (cord included) in 1-2 hours.
